channel.title: Help!
channel.description: I need help with setting drops and giving monsters hp :confused:?

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @Phonecheck Phonecheck
item.description:
@Phonecheck wrote:

eclipse245:

all you need to do is first off, look for a tut, and if there isnt any…go into you npchandler.cfg or .java and look for the monster ID and then it will tell you everything about the monster, then all you ahve to do is change those things. i am not so sure about drops but I think you can od that in Npchandler as well.

Wrong.
Open your Npc.cfg and all your npcs are in there.
To add drops you must make a public static int in your Item3.JAVA and then add it in your npchandler.JAVA.I wont get anymore specific because there are about 3 tuts on how to do this.use the search feature please.

Read full topic
